info.name: Nobel West
info.longDescription:
Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, city views, and modern amenities such as free WiFi, flat-screen TVs, and work desks.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests enjoy a bar, free WiFi throughout the property, a paid airport shuttle service, elevator, 24-hour front desk, housekeeping, and luggage storage.

Delicious Breakfast: A continental buffet breakfast with vegetarian and gluten-free options includes local specialties, warm dishes, fresh pastries, cheese, fruits, and juice.

Prime Location: Located 4.3 mi from Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport, near attractions like Belgrade Arena (1.9 mi) and Republic Square (3.7 mi). An ice-skating rink is in the surroundings.
